amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the EPA from procuring or disclosing the private information of farmers and ranchers.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 57 printed in Part B of House Report 113-117 to prohibit the EPA from procuring or disclosing the private information of farmers and ranchers.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Crawford amendment (A050) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Crawford amendment (A050) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A050) offered by Mr. Crawford.
